borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission reference: 2024/00777/FUL dated 21st June 2024 for the 'Erection of a rear roof extension, involving an increase in the ridge height by 200mm; erection of a rear extension at second floor level, on top of the existing back addition; erection of a single storey rear extension, to the side and rear of existing back addition; raising the height of ground floor adjoining party walls (both sides) to 3.2m height; formation of a courtyard to the rear of proposed ground floor rear extension and the main building, including raising the height of existing brick wall to 2m height with new brick coping and tile creasing to the side elevation; installation of 2no. rooflights in the front roofslope; bricking up 1no. small window, and installation of a new window to the rear elevation at first floor level.' Amendment sought for partial infilling existing side facing staircase window with brick, widening by 300mm, and lowering side dormer with new opaque glass, widening rear dormer by 300mm.
